name: CVE-2010-0265
description: Buffer overflow in Microsoft Windows Movie Maker 2.1, 2.6, and 6.0, and Microsoft Producer 2003, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted project (.MSWMM) file, aka "Movie Maker and Producer Buffer Overflow Vulnerability."
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:windows_movie_maker:2.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:-:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:*:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:windows_movie_maker:2.6:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:windows_movie_maker:6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:windows_movie_maker:2.6:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:windows_movie_maker:6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp1:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:*:x64:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:windows_movie_maker:2.6:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:producer:2003:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
